name: Nudist Beach Survival Simulator 2
description:
...and you have to get out of here!

I guess the beach people didn't like your red panties. You can't let them take them off.

CRAFTING

Use the elements available on the beach and your talent as an engineer to build a high-tech weapon that will help you survive on a beach like this:

  • Stick
  • Dildo on stick
  • Nudist shooting cannon
  • Nudist shooting cannon, but faster
  • Other cool stuff like that

POWERFULL ENEMIES

Face the mighty nudists who will want to get rid of you when their weaker brothers can't. There are four of them, and each has his own unique way of fighting.


Plus some cool stuff:

  • Dwarf throw
  • Big wrinkled tits
  • You can censor everything, calm down
  • Realistic physics
  • Red panties highlighting your figure
  • Helicopter flight

If you're not afraid of trauma, you value humor at a high level and you shoot right, then you'll surely be able to tame the Nudist Beach. See for yourself!
